A mụrụ Chileshe Mpundu Kapwepwe na Zambia na 10 Julaị 1958
Gịnị kpatara ụbọchị ọmụmụ dị iche na nwanne ya nwanyị ejima Mulenga Kapwepwe?) O nwere nwanne ejima, Mulenga Mpundu Kapwepwe, onye bụ onye edemede na onye rụpụtara onye Zambia
Ụlọ ihe ngosi nka nke ụmụ nwanyị
Chileshe Kapwepwe jide Master of Business Administration na bụ Chartered akwụkwọ Akaụntụ
Ọ bụ onye otu nke Association of Chartered and Certified Accountants (ACCA) nke United Kingdom, na onye otu nke Zambia Institute of Chartered Accountants (ZICA).
Nwada Kapwepwe bụ ọkachamara na-akwụ ụgwọ ego, nwere ahụmahụ na mpaghara ọchịchị, amụma ọha na eze na njikwa ego
Ọrụ ya gbatịrị ihe karịrị narị afọ anọ na ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara, na nke mba ụwa, na mpaghara ọha na nke onwe.
